# JhuangNYC - Professional Cryptocurrency Mining Hardware
> Professional-grade ASIC miners and mining solutions trusted since 2020.

This llms.txt provides an LLM-friendly index of key pages. Each link points to the canonical human-facing page; agents may skip items under “Optional” for shorter contexts.

## About
- [Our Story](/about): Mission, values, and company background
- [Contact](/contact): Sales and support channels
- [Learn More](/learn-more): Solutions overview

## Products
- [Shop All](/collections/all): Full catalog of available hardware
- [Product Specifications](/products/specs): Miner comparison matrix and technical specs

## Guides
- [ASIC Buying Guide](/guides/asic-buying-guide): Hardware selection framework and ROI guardrails
- [Setup Guides](/guides): Installation, configuration, and tuning resources

## Support
- [Warranty](/policies/warranty): Coverage and service-level commitments
- [Returns & Refunds](/policies/returns): RMA workflow and refund timelines
- [Shipping](/shipping): Delivery options, timing, and insurance
- [Contact Support](/contact): Ticket submission and escalation path

## Legal
- [Terms of Service](/terms): Service terms and conditions
- [Privacy Policy](/privacy): Privacy and cookies information

## Sitemap
- [XML Sitemap](/sitemap.xml): Canonical crawl index
- [Robots.txt](/robots.txt): Crawling allowances and disallows
